`r na.omit(paragraphs$part1_org_info)`

The headline analysis in this report measured proven reoffences in a one-year period for a 'treatment group' of `r num_people_end` offenders who received support some time `r time_period`, and for a much larger 'comparison group' of similar offenders who did not receive it. The analysis estimates the impact of the support from `r organisation_name` on the reoffending behaviour of people who are similar to those in the treatment group. 

The support may have had a different impact on `r num_people_diff` other participants whose details were submitted but who did not meet the minimum criteria for analysis.
